Interface Graph

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdjacencyList, AdjacencyMatrix, IncidenceMatrix
public interface Graph

  • Method Details

    • add

      void add(Vertex vertex)
      Adds a vertex to this graph.
      Parameters:
      vertex - a vertex to add
      Throws:
      DuplicateVertexException - when the given vertex is already in this graph

    • delete

      void delete(Vertex vertex)
      Removes a vertex from this graph.
      Parameters:
      vertex - a vertex to remove
      Throws:
      NoSuchVertexException - when this graph does not have the given vertex

    • has

      boolean has(Vertex vertex)
      Checks whether this graph has the given vertex.
      Parameters:
      vertex - a vertex to check
      Returns:
      true if a vertex appears in this graph, false otherwise

    • add

      void add(Edge edge)
      Adds an edge to this graph. If this graph does not have vertices of this edge, they will be added as a side effect.
      Parameters:
      edge - an edge to add
      Throws:
      DuplicateEdgeException - when the given edge is already in this graph

    • delete

      void delete(Edge edge)
      Removes an edge from this graph.
      Parameters:
      edge - an edge to remove
      Throws:
      NoSuchVertexException - when this graph does not have any vertex of this edge
      NoSuchEdgeException - when this graph does not have the given edge

    • has

      boolean has(Edge edge)
      Checks whether this graph has the given edge.
      Parameters:
      edge - an edge to check
      Returns:
      true if an edge in this graph, false otherwise

    • getVertices

      Vertex[] getVertices()
      Returns vertices of this graph. The returned array should be independent with the graph state.
      Returns:
      an array of vertices

    • getNeighbours

      Vertex[] getNeighbours(Vertex vertex)
      Returns neighbours of the vertex. The returned array should be independent with the graph state.
      Parameters:
      vertex - a vertex to search neighbours of
      Returns:
      an array of vertices
      Throws:
      NoSuchVertexException - when this graph does not have the given vertex

    • equalsTo

      default boolean equalsTo(Object o)
